definitions.text: the most interesting or memorable part
examples: the highlight of the tour was our visit to the Vatican

definitions.text: an area of lightness in a picture
move into the foreground to make more visible or prominent
examples: The introduction highlighted the speaker's distinguished career in linguistics

definitions.text: apply a highlighter to one's cheeks or eyebrows in order to make them more prominent
examples: highlight the area above your eyebrows
